message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $950000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $925000. It's a fair price considering the product's value to you, and I think you'll be happy with the deal.

I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $925000. I'm willing to meet you at $915000, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. I think that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make another compromise. I'll meet you at $920000. It's a small increase from your last offer, but I think it's still a fair price considering the product's value to you. I'm willing to make this deal work, but I'm not willing to go any lower.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you at $915000, which is my previous offer. I think that's a fair price considering the product's value to me. If not, I'm afraid I'll have to consider buying from John for $1000000.
